body_html:
@soumith thank you for the answer!
in autograd extensions section there is a subsection with gradcheck. And in this section Variable is used. I thought that in 0.4 and in future Variable will be fully deprecated. Also for new users it can be confusing because of merging Tensor and Variable.
body_text:
@soumith thank you for the answer!
in autograd extensions section there is a subsection with gradcheck. And in this section Variable is used. I thought that in 0.4 and in future Variable will be fully deprecated. Also for new users it can be confusing because of merging Tensor and Variable.
body:
@soumith thank you for the answer!
in autograd extensions section there is a subsection with gradcheck. And in this section Variable is used. I thought that in 0.4 and in future Variable will be fully deprecated. Also for new users it can be confusing because of merging Tensor and Variable.
